sys_ui_page.html:
_CUT_HERE_ $[ var docapi = new x_snc_devtools.DocumentationAPI('9c10da6cdbf68110bcced03cd39619cd'); docapi.RenderHeader(); ]

Welcome to DataSilosRM - the DataSilos plugin for Release Management - created and maintained by Sascha Wildgrube.

Features

This app extends DataSilos to the tables rm_product, rm_release, rm_feature and rm_task contained in the Release Management plugin.

Related records are not (yet) considered, so visibility to a task does not automatically make related features or releases visible. However, this feature might be added at a later point in time.

Disclaimer

$[docapi.RenderDisclaimer()]

System Requirements

    $[ docapi.RenderSystemRequirements( 'Quebec,Rome,San Diego', true, AppGetDependencies()); ]

Installation

  1. Verify that DataSilos is installed.
    2. $[ docapi.RenderInstallationInstructionsImportFromSourceControl( 'DataSilosRM', 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-datasilos-rm'); ] $[ docapi.RenderInstallationInstructionsAppInstall(); ]
